  • Space Awareness Widget: Brand new widget! Space Awareness shows you which apps have windows open in your current macOS Space, giving you instant context about what's active on each desktop. Stay on top of your workflow without ever losing track!
  • Minimized App Retention: Minimized apps stay visible in the Space Awareness widget so you don't lose track of them when switching focus. No more hunting for hidden windows!
  • Per-Screen Scoping: Space Awareness items are scoped to each dock's screen, so multi-monitor setups show the right apps on the right display. Your workflow stays perfectly organized across all your screens!
  • Automatic Cleanup on Space Switch: Retained apps are automatically cleared when you switch Spaces, keeping the widget fresh and relevant at all times.
